name: SportsFanatic
0: ”Alexa, ask Sports Fanatic for a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports fanatic
des: There is no preqreqs or additional software needed for this to work. To find out cool facts about sports just say open sports fanatic and you will be told a cool sports fact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
